com.mapbox.pluginscalebar

Class ScaleBarPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.pluginscalebar.ScaleBarPlugin

  • public class ScaleBarPlugin
extends Object
    Plugin class that shows a scale bar on MapView and changes the scale corresponding to the MapView's scale.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScaleBarPlugin(MapView mapView, MapboxMap mapboxMap) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ScaleBarWidget create(ScaleBarOptions option)
      Create a scale bar widget on mapView.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Returns true if the scale plugin is currently enabled and visible.
      void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Toggles the scale plugin state.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScaleBarPlugin

        public ScaleBarPlugin(MapView mapView,
                      MapboxMap mapboxMap)

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public ScaleBarWidget create(ScaleBarOptions option)
        Create a scale bar widget on mapView.
        Parameters:
        option - The scale bar widget options that used to build scale bar widget.
        Returns:
        The created ScaleBarWidget instance.

      • isEnabled

        public boolean isEnabled()
        Returns true if the scale plugin is currently enabled and visible.
        Returns:
        true if enabled, false otherwise

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Toggles the scale plugin state.

        If the scale plugin wasn enabled, a com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnCameraMoveListener will be added to the MapView to listen to scale change events to update the state of this plugin. If the plugin was disabled the com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps.MapboxMap.OnCameraMoveListener will be removed from the map.
